DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize new United States Department Agriculture ( USDA ) regulation lunch serve part National School Lunch Program decrease percentage enrol student purchase lunch , increase percentage child take fruit vegetable , decrease percentage fruit vegetable serving throw away , increase total number fruit vegetable serving eaten . The investigator also hypothesize regulation force , simple behavioral intervention counteract potentially negative impact lunch sale consumption . In word , implement regulation behavioral intervention together , percentage enrol student take school lunch increase least back baseline level , percentage child take fruit vegetable increase , percentage fruit vegetable serving waste decrease , total number fruit vegetable serving eaten increase .

The new regulation school lunch schedule roll nationally fall year , study design provide indication impact new regulation would .
